---
title: "TensorView"
---
<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

A view on a tensor of any dimensionality.

## Properties

### `colormap`
Configures how scalars are mapped to color.

* `colormap`: How scalar values map to colors.
* `gamma`: Gamma exponent applied to normalized values before mapping to color.
### `filter`
Configures how the selected slice is displayed.

* `scaling`: How the image is scaled to fit the view.
* `mag_filter`: Filter used when zooming in on the tensor.

## API reference links
 * üêç [Python API docs for `TensorView`](https://ref.rerun.io/docs/python/stable/common/blueprint_views#rerun.blueprint.views.TensorView)
